DOC.brief_summary: This study aim test efficacy cost effectiveness new service delivery method enhance reach impact standard care treatment , Behavioral Parent Training ( BPT ) , early onset disruptive behavior disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Technology Enhance Treatment Early Conduct Problems Low Income Families
DOC.detailed_description: Families randomize one two active treatment condition , standard BPT program standard BPT program plus new service delivery method .
DOC.criteria: Child age 3 7 year clinically significant disruptive behavior lowincome family Caregiver current mood , substance use , and/or psychotic disorder Child current pervasive developmental and/or psychotic disorder Family current allegation and/or past substantiation child protective service
